name: vrchat
author: yunyun
short: VRChat search/profile cog (dropdown details, world author button, watchlist, 2FA UI)
description: VRChat command group for Red-DiscordBot. Search users/worlds with a dropdown to open details, fetch by ID, link Discordâ†”VRChat ID, guild watchlist notifications, and interactive 2FA verification (TOTP/Email OTP).
install_msg: Loaded! Owner: set credentials with `vrc setcreds <username> <password>`. If VRChat requires 2FA, run `vrc 2fa`. For watchlist: set `vrc watchchannel` then add watchers via `vrc watch`.
